content.rendered: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Tempulli College has collaborations with various institutions at home and abroad. Thanks to these collaborations Tempulli College students conduct study visits and regular internships at these partner institutions. In addition to periodic internships during the semesters, each student is required to maintain a professional internship during the last year of the Bachelor program for one semester, in order to conduct research within the student’s independent project to achieve successful completion of relevant cycle of studies.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
